welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sasebo, Japan! Known for its beautiful coastline, historic attractions, and delicious seafood, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nagasaki Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
